articles.title: Nielsen and Roku Expand Strategic Measurement Partnership
articles.mainIdea: Nielsen and Roku Expand Strategic Measurement Partnership
articles.summary: Business Wire: Nielsen and Roku Expand Strategic Measurement Partnership. NEW YORK, December 22, 2025--Today, Nielsen, a global leader in audience measurement, data, and analytics, and Roku, a leading TV streaming platform*, announced an expansion of their long-term strategic partnership. Building on years of collaboration, this next phase will incorporate Roku data into Nielsenâ€™s advanced campaign measurement and outcome solutions.
